text: Dag Vag is a Swedish pop, reggae, and punk band. It was formed in 1978. The lead singer was Per Odeltorp (1948-2012), popularly known as Stig Vig. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *1979 - Dag Vag *1979 - Scenbuddism (Live) *1980 - Palsternacka *1982 - 7 lyckliga elefanter *1983 - Almanacka *1989 - Helq *1992 - Halleluja! *2006 - Kackerlacka *2007 - Klassiker *2012 - Nattmacka ===Singles=== *1978 - Dimma (under the name Dag Vag & Svagsinta) *1978 - Flyger *1980 - Hellre en raket *1981 - Blöt dröm *1981 - Popitop *1983 - Samma sång *1989 - Du får aldrig nog *1989 - Tiden går *1990 - En gång till! *1991 - Nya skor *1992 - Hämta mej *1992 - Fyrverkeri *2006 - En del av dej ===EP=== *2011 - epette ==Other websites== *www.dagvag.se - Official web page Category:1978 establishments in Sweden Category:Swedish pop music groups
title: Dag Vag
